a: Some tests require fasting for 8–12 hours. Drink water only unless your clinician advised otherwise.

a: Most lab results are posted to the Health Portal within 2–3 business days. Your clinician will contact you if follow-up is needed.

a: Do not eat for 6 hours before the exam. You may drink small sips of water and take essential medications.
